title: pleas help
body: my client keeps crashing  i keeps lagging very bad in game it happened after the server had work done on it two days ago after i started up lol i noticed my icon would not show up in arrams it shows default icon as if i disconnected form game if i make custom game it says retrieving data from server my internet is fine im running 54 mb a sec im running 5 bars  on wifi i have uninstalled and reinstalled did not fix it i have done everything i could think of to fix it

replies.body: I'm having some trouble understanding your issue exactly.  When you say your client is crashing, what do you mean exactly?  To be clear, you mean specifically the client and not the game right?  Do you receive any error messages and what does it say?  Any screenshots as well could help.  Let me know!
